Package commandManager.commands

Class BaseCommand

java.lang.Object
commandManager.commands.BaseCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
AverageOfMinutesOfWaitingCommand, ClearCommand, ExecuteCommand, ExitCommand, FilterContainsNameCommand, HelpCommand, HistoryCommand, InfoCommand, InsertCommand, RemoveAllByMinutesOfWaitingCommand, RemoveKeyCommand, RemoveLowerCommand, RemoveLowerKeyCommand, SaveCommand, ShowCommand, UpdateCommand
public abstract class BaseCommand extends Object
An interface for classes that implement commands to work with the HashTableManager.
